column1: Faculty in Computational Biology and Bioprocess Technology
column2: We are seeking a dynamic and motivated individual to join our faculty as an Assistant/Associate Professor in Computational Biology and Bioprocess Technology .                  Computational Biology:            The ideal candidate will demonstrate the ability to design, develop, and validate statistical analysis models and machine learning solutions using multimodal data, including cellular imaging and multi-omics data.      Additionally, the candidate should be capable of conducting various analyses on clinical and pre-clinical data to identify patterns and trends, including standard and complex differential analyses of omics data from a variety of samples.          Responsibilities:          Develop and teach undergraduate and graduate courses in computational biology, genomics, bioinformatics, or related fields.      Design, develop, and validate statistical analysis models and machine learning solutions for analysing multimodal data, including cellular imaging and multi-omics data.      Conduct various analyses on clinical and pre-clinical data to identify patterns and trends, including standard and complex differential analyses of omics data from a variety of samples.      Stay current with advances in computational biology, genomics, and machine learning, and apply cutting-edge techniques to research projects.      Present research findings at scientific conferences and publish in peer-reviewed journals.      Mentor and supervise graduate students and postdoctoral researchers.          Qualification:          PhD in computational biology, bioinformatics, statistical genomics, or a related field.      Strong background in computational and statistical genomics, clinical informatics, computational systems biology, and computational neurosciences.      Experience with machine learning techniques and frameworks, such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow.                Bioprocess Technology:            The ideal candidate will demonstrate competence in microbial (bacteria & yeast), mammalian, plant, and insect cell cultures, fermentation, recombinant production of medical products & therapies, purification / immobilization / scale-up of industrial enzymes, green products & biomaterials, food & beverages, specialty chemicals, and machine learning in automation, precision biomanufacturing, biofertilizers, and biopesticides.          Responsibilities:          Develop and teach undergraduate and graduate courses in bioprocess engineering, biotechnology, biochemical engineering, or related fields.      Establish and maintain an independent research program focused on optimizing bioprocess technologies for biologics production.      Conduct research in microbial, mammalian, plant, and insect cell cultures, fermentation, recombinant production of medical products & therapies, purification / immobilization / scale-up of industrial enzymes, green products & biomaterials, food & beverages, and specialty chemicals.      Incorporate machine learning techniques into bioprocess optimization and automation          Qualification:          D. in chemical engineering, biochemical engineering, biotechnology, or a related field.      Post-doctoral research experience in optimizing bioprocess technologies for biologics production.      Expertise in microbial (bacteria & yeast), mammalian, plant, and insect cell cultures, fermentation, recombinant production of medical products & therapies, purification / immobilization / scale-up of industrial enzymes, green products & biomaterials, food & beverages, and specialty chemicals
column11: Automation, Statistical analysis, Chemical, Genomics, Machine learning, Manager Technology, Research, Bioinformatics, clinical data, Computational biology

column1: Medical Coding-Wanted Ophthalmic Nursing Assistant, Clinical Care Tech
column2: Position: Medical Coder Ct HR BHAVANI - 9566284629 Medical Coding is the process of converting patient health information into alpha numeric codes. Coders take medial reports from doctors, which may include a patients condition, the doctors diagnosis, a prescription, and whatever procedures the doctor or healthcare provider performed on the patient, and turn that into a set of codes, which make up a crucial part of the medical claim. column2: Role & responsibilities     Develop and implement innovative methods and processes to isolate, cultivate, and maintain plant cell lines in tissue culture  Conduct screening and isolation of plant cells from a wide range of cultured tissues and explants  Develop, optimize, and subculture suspension and callus cultures   Develop, select, and optimize media for callus and cell suspension cultures ?? Utilize a variety of skill sets to measure cell growth, and test the viability of cell growth in suspension or solid cultures ??Highly experienced in microscopy including confocal microscopy ?? Highly skilled and efficient in experimental design (D.o.E) and data reporting to leadership level management - Highly innovative and creative Manage the day-to-day operations of the Tissue Culture Lab with primary oversight responsibilities including ??initiation of new plant varieties, production planning, media preparation, sterilization, tracking plants, and all facility logistics Develop, standardize, and optimize all technical processes within the operation.  c) Support internal R&D efforts.  d) Manage the entire tissue culture process and maintain accurate records. Results need to be presented to management and key stakeholders.  e) Provide training and oversight to new technicians. f) Media preparation and training of media personnel ??mixing necessary ingredients for media preparation.  g) Ensure all employees are operating safely and following all company health and safety standards. Serve as safety coordinator and primary lab emergency contact.  h) Do the weekly production schedule/planning  i) Ensure that the laboratory is kept in a clean and good operating condition, including working with outside vendors as needed.  j) Track and organize preventative maintenance, calibration, and any troubleshooting of equipment.  k) Manage plant hardening and greenhouse operations to ensure healthy plant stock is shipped to customers. l) In collaboration with other team members, develop, update, and maintain accurate protocols for tissue culture process. m) Attend required meetings and participate in team and professional development activities.  n) Communicate effectively both written and orally and demonstrate a sense of timeliness.  Preferred candidate profile     Bachelor and/or advanced degree in biological sciences   or related field, or equivalent combination of relevant experience, education   or training 2 years of prior experience in plant tissue culture   required Perks and benefits

column2: Ensure laboratory and other health care equipment are in good working order. Install, maintain, test, calibrate, and repair different types of equipment, and also teach others how to operate. Under general supervision, perform skilled duties in the testing, troubleshooting, repair, and calibration of equipment in the laboratory; maintain and repair computer network, and perform related work as required.      Performs technical work in the maintenance, repair, calibration and installation of various electronic/analytical equipment; distributes and maintains laboratory test equipment for users; ensures efficient operation of computer network; and arranges for repair and calibration of major equipment.          Key Duties and responsibilities:        1. Installs new equipment by adjusting, establishing, testing, and calibrating performance      2. Troubleshoots, repairs, calibrates, designs circuit and fabricates biomedical/analytical and      electronic test equipment s and maintain documentation.      3. Order and maintain inventory of replacement parts for electronic equipment; maintains warranty, service and repair records; works with vendors to obtain pricing and availability of needed parts; performs quality checks on newly delivered equipment to ensure proper operation.      4. Directs operation of biomedical/analytical equipment by providing demonstrations, supplying information and data, instructing others in the care and use of equipment, and answering all questions.      5. Trains and guides lab users to assure proper operation and maintenance of equipment and laboratory; distributes parts to students and startups for use in laboratory exercises.      6. Plans and schedules software upgrades; tests, debugs, configures and documents software as required to meet user needs.      7. Establishes and maintains laboratory procedures.      8. Basic soldering skills & understanding of ESD protection. Well versed in usage of volt/power meter, oscilloscope and hand-held power tools.

column1: Jr Scientist - Cell Culture & Protein Chemistry
column2: Krishgen BioSystems is looking for Jr Scientist - Cell Culture & Protein Chemistry to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     Cell Culture Techniques:Perform cell culture techniques to maintain and grow various cell lines, including primary cells, immortalized cell lines, and stem cells     Prepare cell culture media, supplements, and reagents, and monitor cell growth, viability, and morphology     Protein Expression and Purification:Express recombinant proteins in mammalian, bacterial, or yeast expression systems using molecular biology techniques such as cloning, transfection, and transformation     Purify proteins using chromatography techniques, including affinity chromatography, size exclusion chromatography, and ion exchange chromatography     Protein Analysis and Characterization:Conduct protein analysis using methods such as SDS-PAGE, Western blotting, ELISA, and immunoprecipitation to assess protein expression, purity, and functionality     Perform protein characterization studies, including protein-protein interactions, enzyme kinetics, and protein folding analysis     Cell-based Assays:Develop and perform cell-based assays to study cellular functions, signaling pathways, and drug responses     Utilize techniques such as proliferation assays, apoptosis assays, migration assays, and reporter gene assays to evaluate cellular responses     Experimental Design and Data Analysis:Design experiments, plan protocols, and troubleshoot technical issues to ensure the validity and reproducibility of experimental results     Analyze experimental data using statistical methods and data analysis software to draw conclusions and interpret findings     Laboratory Management:Maintain laboratory equipment, supplies, and reagents, and ensure compliance with laboratory safety protocols and regulations     Document experimental procedures, results, and observations in laboratory notebooks or electronic databases     Collaboration and Communication:Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams, including other scientists, researchers, and technicians, to achieve research objectives and milestones     Communicate research findings through oral presentations, written reports, and scientific publications

column1: Junior Research Fellow SERB- m6Autism Project
column2: Brief Description about the Project                      We are interested in understanding the role of RNA modifications in Autism spectrum disorder. Basically, how RNA modifications play role in regulating the translation during neurodevelopment.                     Preferred Qualifications:      Masters in any area under biology or life sciences disciplines. Other candidates with training and experience in other scientific areas and keen in applying a multidisciplinary approach to understand biological processes will be considered too.                     Language       :     English                     Experience:     Individuals with experience in model system research or with wet lab experience in cellular or molecular biology will be preferred.                         Roles and Responsibilities     :                       Basic and hands on trining on DNA and RNA isolation, traning on cell culture methods. Designing and executing experiments in consideration with available literature.                      Co-ordinating between research teams and departments as necessary for the project.                      Helping in ordering of lab consumables, lab record keeping and overall lab management                      Co-relating developmental finding with specific disease conditions based on lab s interest.
